item.description:
Black Eyed Sally's BBQ & Blues, Hartford, CT  Sally's biggest party of the year! It's the annual Mardi Gras Madness celebration at Hartford's Home of the Blues when River City Slim & The Zydeco Hogs come by for a Fat Tuesday Zydeco party. Beads, brews, BBQ and The Zydeco Hogs - what more could you need? Sally's has the best Southern-style food in the area. Combine that with smokin' Zydeco dance grooves and you'll think you've left Hartford behind for the Bayou Country! Black Eyed Sally's is located at 350 Asylum Street in downtown Hartford. 

That's right...and we're going to the party! Join us as we eat, drink and dance the night away in true Mardi Gras style. We are having dinner at 7pm. I have reserved a dinner table for 12. The first 12 will be counted in for dinner, so act quickly to ensure your spot! Of course you are welcome to join us after dinner for the music and dancing. Come earn those beads!!!!!!!

BTW...wear your Mardi Gras colors...Green, Purple and Gold!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or Stuart or the Meetup Sign...Terri's cell: 203-808-5829
item.why: Mardi Gras Celebration @ Black Eyed Sally's!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Fat Tuesday @ Black Eyed Sally's! Come Earn Your Beads!!!
